content.question: The pulse (beat) and division of the beat are best described as a

choices.label: duple pulse with a simple division of the beat
duple pulse with a compound division of the beat
triple pulse with a simple division of the beat
triple pulse with a compound division of the beat

content.answer: duple pulse with a simple division of the beat

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in performed music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
